Records – 8122-73300-2, Rhino Records (2) – 8122-73300-2, Warner Strategic Marketing – 8122-73300-2 CD, Album, Reissue, Remastered, Stereo DVD, DVD-Audio, Multichannel, Copy Protected, Stereo Europe 16 янв. 2006 г. Rock, Stage & Screen New Wave, Art Rock, Leftfield, Music Video Remastered CD+DVD doublepack, cover sticker with 16-page booklet. CD includes four previously unreleased bonus tracks. DVD features the original album in 5.1 Surround Sound and Dolby Stereo, a photo gallery and two bonus videos recorded in 1980 on the German TV show "Rockpop".
response.title: Talking Heads - Remain In Light - 1980 (DVD-Audio)
